Attributes.description: A conceptual and practical introduction to the major areas of business strategy with an integrative perspective on managing a business. Includes the analysis of a business and its environment, the development and evaluation of strategic alternatives, and implementation of change.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of BUSI 291, BUSI 293, BUSI 294, BUSI 295, BUSI 335, BUSI 353, BUSI 370, BUSI 393, BUSI 450.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Thu, Start Time: 18:30, End Time: 21:30
